entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
